source: ### Highlight your Digital Method
Tired of journals asking you to cut down your methodological developments? JDH introduces a **hermeneutics layer** where you will be able to fully go into detail.
### Show your Data
Gathering data and preparing/structuring your corpus is 90% of the job. Show it, thanks to JDH’s **data layer**.
### Tell the (Hi)story
JDH will allow you to elaborate a **narrative layer** that goes beyond the traditional scope of academic journals.
### Rigour of a Peer Review Process
But don’t give up on rigour. JDH is based on a double blind peer review process.
### Looking for Early Bird Contributors
For our first edition of the Journal of Digital History we are looking for enthusiastic authors that want to join with a first contribution! The first issue will target the topic of
### Andreas Fickers
[Andreas Fickers](https://www.c2dh.uni.lu/people/andreas-fickers) is the Professor Director at the C2DH, University of Luxembourg.
### Frédéric Clavert
[Frédéric Clavert](https://www.c2dh.uni.lu/people/frederic-clavert) is an Assistant Professor at the C2DH, University of Luxembourg.
### Sean Takats
[Sean Takats](https://www.c2dh.uni.lu/people/sean-takats) is a Professor at the C2DH, University of Luxembourg.
### Jane Winters
[Jane Winters](https://research.sas.ac.uk/search/staff/126/dr-jane-winters/) is a Professor of Digital Humanities at the School of Advanced Study, University of London.
### Ian Milligan
[Ian Milligan](https://www.ianmilligan.ca/) is an Associate Professor of History at the University of Waterloo.
### Tim Hitchcock
[Tim Hitchcock](https://profiles.sussex.ac.uk/p336034-tim-hitchcock) is a Professor of Digital History, School of Media, Arts and Humanities at the University of Sussex.
### Edward Ayers
[Edward Ayers](https://www.edwardayers.com/) is a Tucker-Boatwright Professor of the Humanities and President Emeritus at the University of Richmond.
### Pelle Snickars
[Pelle Snickars](https://www.umu.se/en/staff/pelle-snickars/) is a Professor of Media Studies at the Department of Cultural and Media Studies at the Umeå University.
### Dilton Maynard
[Dilton Maynard](https://ufs-br.academia.edu/DiltonMaynard) is an Associate Professor in the Department of History at the Federal University of Sergipe.
### Nadezhda Povroznik
[Nadezhda Povroznik](http://povroznik.com/eng/) is an Associate Professor at the Perm State University.
### Stefano Dall'Aglio
[Stefano Dall'Aglio](https://www.unive.it/data/people/20962884) is Political and Religious Historian of early Modern Italy at the Univerity Ca'Foscary, Venezia.
### Mareike König
[Mareike König](https://hcommons.org/members/mareike2405/) is a Research Fellow and Head Librarian at the German Historical Institute in Paris.
### William Thomas
[William Thomas](https://cdrh.unl.edu/about/faculty/thomas) is a Professor of History and John and Catherine Angle Chair in the Humanities, University of Nebraska.
### Anat Ben-David
[Anat Ben-David](https://www.anatbendavid.info/) is a Senior Lecturer in the Department of Sociology, Political Science and Communication at the Open University of Israel.
